info.name: Craigslist Christmas Theme
info.description:
This is a Christmas colored theme for Craigslist.org.
Now makes ALL CAPS POSTINGS lowercase, for Sanity.
12.23.2013 - Added all white handle highlighting! 

Now hides images until you mouse over them for the NSFW images. 

Share and Enjoy!
